skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: I possess strong front-end development skills, proficient in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Experienced in building responsive and visually appealing web interfaces using modern frameworks like React.js and Vue.js.

skills.title: Back-End
skills.description: Skilled in back-end development, adept at constructing scalable web applications utilizing Python, PHP, or Node.js. Proficient in database creation and management (MySQL) and adept at leveraging frameworks such as Laravel for development and maintenance.

skills.title: UX/UI
skills.description: Skilled in UX/UI design, creating intuitive interfaces for web and mobile apps. Skilled in utilizing design tools such as Figma to develop user-centric interfaces that enhance usability and accessibility

skills.title: Graphic Design
skills.description: Proficient in Canva, creating impactful designs for digital and print media. Skilled in typography, color theory, and layout composition to deliver visually compelling graphics.

portfolio.title: My Portfolio
portfolio.description: My portfolio website is a showcase of my journey as a Full Stack Developer, highlighting my expertise in web development, design, and problem-solving. Featuring a collection of my recent projects, it demonstrates my proficiency in technologies like React, Python, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. With a user-friendly interface and smooth navigation, it reflects my commitment to delivering impactful and engaging web experiences. Overall, my portfolio website is a testament to my skills, creativity, and passion for creating innovative digital solutions.

portfolio.title: Gatepass System
portfolio.description: This system is a web application that I developed as a Full Stack Developer. It is designed to streamline and automate the process of issuing gate passes in a secure and efficient manner. The app is built using PHP and incorporates features for user authentication, form submission, and gate pass generation. It includes a user-friendly interface for requesting gate passes, with fields for entering necessary information such as purpose, date, time, and destination. The app also includes an administrative interface for managing gate pass requests, reviewing details, and approving or rejecting requests as needed. Overall, the Gatepass app project demonstrates my ability to develop practical solutions that enhance operational efficiency and security within organizational settings.

portfolio.title: ALX S/W Engineering Program
portfolio.description: The ALX Software Engineering Program empowered me with in-depth skills in software development through hands-on projects and mentorship from industry experts, fostering a confident and collaborative approach to solving complex challenges in the field.

experience.title: ICT Support Officer
experience.description: Led initiatives to enhance operational efficiency through the development and implementation of a gate pass system, proactive support in ERP utilization, and rigorous data security measures, resulting in improved system adoption, zero breaches, and streamlined troubleshooting processes.

experience.title: Voter Registration Clerk
experience.description: Achieved 100% accurate voter registration and surpassed targets by 25%, while efficiently managing changes in voters' voting stations to enhance electoral compliance and efficiency.

experience.title: Quality and Risk Management Intern
experience.description: Effectively coordinated data management activities, leading to a 20% increase in accuracy and efficiency, while ensuring compliance with audit requirements by maintaining sign-in registers.
